title: Professional Document Structure & Formatting
description: Transform disorganized content into polished, professional documents
source: Based on technical writing best practices from Medium and content strategy guides

steps.title: Document Structure and Formatting
steps.description: Organize content and apply professional formatting
steps.toolReason: Excellent at organizing information and creating clear document structure
steps.prompt:
You are an experienced technical writer. Think step by step to organize this content.

Restructure this content with:
1. Clear document hierarchy (H1, H2, H3)
2. Professional formatting (lists, tables, emphasis)
3. Logical flow and transitions
4. Consistent tone and style

Content: [paste your unstructured content]
Document type: [report/proposal/guide]
Audience: [internal/external/technical]
Tone: [formal/professional/friendly]

Format using markdown with:
- **Bold** for key points
- Lists for multiple items
- Tables for data
- > Callouts for important notes
tips: Start with a clear document outline before formatting
